channel.title: [PI] Help Adding Crown to REGULAR chat [PI]
channel.description:
I made a new rank, Now I want to add a Mod (Player right of 1) Crown in the regular chat not yell. I already have a yell crown for the rank. What I need is to know how to put one in on the regular chat.
Please and Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Help Adding Crown to REGULAR chat [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

I went on the liberty to find you a tut.
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/348186-making-14-rank-system-hidden-ranks-included-custom-crowns-updated.html

replace the google.com
with
rune-server.org

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Help Adding Crown to REGULAR chat [PI]
